answers.answer: I have no idea what my test results were, I know the cut off where I live (in va) is somewhere in the 140's. All my doctor told me was she would call me if I failed (she never called) and at my next appointment she told me I passed with flying colors.
Oh geez. I wish that's how mine went..

I heard a lot of people fail the 1 hour but pass the 3 hour one. So if you dont pass the one hour you still have one more chance before they assume you have gd. I thought I was going to have it because I havent been the healthiest this pregnancy but I dont lol
Lol well mine was excessively elevated and both my parents have diabetes sooooo "/

Mine was high for the one hour (being over 144) and was high for the 3 hour as well. This is my 4th pregnancy but my first with GD. It's not fun. You test sugars 4 times a day and log everything you eat. They like to keep your carb intake at a certain amount with each meal so they set up guidelines on your diet and then track your glucose until you deliver. I'm over it already, ugh.

Just because your parents have diabetes,  doesn't mean you have gestational disbetes. Gestational diabetes occur in pregnancy.  I don't remember the cut off score but i failed by 8 points. I took the 3 hour one and passed. I thought i was going to have it, but i don't

Yes I know because my parents have it doesn't mean I will have gd but it definietly increases my chances and especially to just being straight diabetic and not have gd. The nurse told me.My cut off was 130 and I was at 157. That's bad

I know what you mean my dad has to take insulin for his diabetes so they made me take the test twice this pregnancy. My cut off was i believe 140 and they ended up taking my blood 5 minutes before it was due and i was at a 97.
Yea this *****.  All I can do now is just hope for the best.
Really... they bleeped out s...u...c...k...s lol
I think the cut off for here in (Ca) is 140 i scored a 90 for the one hour test and I had even ate something in the morning when I was suppose to be fasting I didnt know I couldnt eat lol
I passed my one hour, my score was 135.
My score was 71 out of 140. I took it in the morning and i didn't eat anything beforehand, i drank water before the appointment though.
I'm sure you'll be fine :)It's nerve wrecking waiting to find out if you have it though. I cried after failing the 1 hour one but I passed the 3 hour one, so I wouldn't worry too much about it
My first 1 hr I scored 150/140 my second 1hr was 198/140. I dont know my score for my 3hr but passed.

question: Alright,  what were you guys glucose scores after the 1 hour test? Please tell me :The cut off number for the test where you liveThe number you receivedAnd did you end up with GD after allI am asking cuz I feel like I'm going to have it and I want to know my chances...
title: 1 hour glucose score?
